rules_text:
Haste
Whenever UX04 Consul R deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if you have less than three cards in your hand, transform UX04 Consul R.
rules_text2:
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, put a +1/+1 counter on Moebius R.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you are stagnant, transform Moebius R. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn.)[/i]
